name: Pixel Pop Chaos 2: Turn up the heat
name_original: Pixel Pop Chaos 2: Turn up the heat
description:
All assets made by me

WARNING: windows may not work with this. This game is a sequel to my first ever game pixel pop made in 5 days forthe Vimjam 3, it uses the focus multi-use by have 1 item with multiple uses, the score in the game is tied to the player health. Turn up the heat, the game theme it that the game will get harder and harder whlist you play.
